/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The street is flanked by traditional Chinese buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. The buildings are adorned with ornate roofs and balconies, adding to the cultural richness of the scene. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching out into the sky, suggesting that the photo was taken during the winter season. The perspective of the photo is from a low angle, looking up at the buildings, giving a sense of grandeur and majesty to the structures.
